imdb.plot outline: Hosted by Gaurav Gera and Sunil Grover, "Laugh India Laugh" is a gag based show with re-packaging of Star One's biggest hit, "The Great Indian Laughter Challenge" which was the trend setter of stand up comedy shows. Even today when we see Raju Srivastava as Gajodhar or Bharati as Laali, the funny bone in us tickles, this show brings back all those performances only with an extra tadka to add up to the precious laughter moments.
imdb.title: Laugh India Laugh
plot: Hosted by Gaurav Gera and Sunil Grover, "_Laugh India Laugh_ (qv)" is a gag based show with re-packaging of Star One's biggest hit, "The Great Indian Laughter Challenge" which was the trend setter of stand up comedy shows.::Anonymous
